thread.section_title: Summer In Italy Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Summer In Italy | www.summerinitaly.com
thread.title: PattyC
thread.title_full: Summer In Italy reviewed by PattyC

author: PattyC
title: PattyC
text: I was exhausted trying to find just the right place for our summer vacation in Italy. I had tried to contact various places and not too many people responded or had updated their calendars...UNTIL I CONTACTED SUMMER IN ITALY! Thank you for your quick response and making me feel like you cared. The whole booking experience was very smooth. We cannot wait to experience our summer in Italy 2017. Thank you Luca Alfano for everything. Looking forward to officially meeting you.
